title: Get the first non-null value
sql:
select coalesce ( 1,    2,    3    ) first, 
       coalesce ( null, 2,    3    ) second, 
       coalesce ( null, null, 3    ) third , 
       coalesce ( null, null, null ) nothing
from   dual;

     FIRST     SECOND      THIRD NOTHING
---------- ---------- ---------- -------
         1          2          3 <null>
